data.what_is:
LeadSquared marketing automation software helps you engage and nurture your customers at every step of their buying journey.

A complete, end-to-end solution, LeadSquared's marketing automation suite consists of:
- Built-in email, WhatsApp and SMS marketing.
- Zero-code automation designer.
- Landing pages, forms and widgets for data capture.
- Complete user activity, interaction and intent tracking.
- Funnel-wise, channel-wise and team-wise reporting.
- Multi-channel and remarketing connectors such as email, text, WhatsApp, social media, phone calls, etc.
- And more

Businesses that have achieved growth with LeadSquared include higher education institutes, edtech, financial services, healthcare, and marketplaces, among others. The company is headquartered in Bengaluru, India, with a local presence in the United States, the Philippines, South Africa, Australia, Singapore and Indonesia.
data.product_description: All in one Sales Execution and Marketing Automation Platform. Map your entire business process in hours not months. Designed to help you sell more-faster. #1 choice for B2C BusinessesLeadSquared is positioned as a customer acquisition platform. Our approach combines lead prioritization engine, powerful marketing automation and sales CRM in one system. Businesses get the benefit of bringing sales and marketing truly on one page and save substantially as they won't have to spend on several different systems for marketing & sales.Businesses that use LeadSquared further gain by reducing lead leakage, increasing their sales productivity (as now they focus only on high-quality leads), reducing the response time (with lead distribution automation) and getting out of the box analytics that tie revenue to lead sources, products and sales people.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Based on 84 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Based on 68 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: Based on 63 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: Based on 79 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Based on 76 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Based on 82 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Based on 55 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Based on 33 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Based on 83 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: As reported in 29 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews. Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 131 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 131 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 126 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 120 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Based on 124 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Based on 113 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Based on 52 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Based on 110 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Based on 67 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: Based on 132 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 132 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 124 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Based on 131 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Based on 124 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Based on 121 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Based on 123 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Based on 99 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Based on 100 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Based on 86 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Based on 63 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices. This feature was mentioned in 40 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores. 55 reviewers of Leadsquared Marketing Automation have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: As reported in 38 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews. Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets. 44 reviewers of Leadsquared Marketing Automation have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails. 44 reviewers of Leadsquared Marketing Automation have provided feedback on this feature.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Based on 55 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews. Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 130 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Based on 106 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Based on 89 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Based on 87 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Based on 54 Leadsquared Marketing Automation reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

initial_reviews.review_title: My review on leadsquared marketing automation
initial_reviews.review_content:

LeadSquared Marketing Automation makes it easy for businesses to manage and track their leads.  lets you automate tasks, and gives insights into how well your marketing efforts are doing.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Interface to be a bit complex, making it challenging for some to navigate and utilize its features efficiently. Additionally, the learning curve can be steep for those unfamiliar with marketing automation tools.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Leadsquared Marketing Automation solves lead management challenges, automates tasks, and improves conversion rates, saving time and boosting productivity.

initial_reviews.review_title: Good CSM support but way too many bugs for a more complex sales and marketing company structure
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
- The automation controls gives a richer data and analytics for the emails sent.

- Data management is smoother with dynamic and static lists.

- Custom field addition and lead scoring made it helpful to maintain a large set of data and run targeted campaigns.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
- The marketing funnel/automation made it possible to do A/B tests, however there should be a simpler method of running A/B tests similar to Mailchimp since A/B testing is quite a fundamental part of Marketing.

- The fact that I can't manually remove a participant from automation, for example, somebody replied that they want to unsubscribe instead of unsubscribing using the footer link. I would have to blacklist that contact altogether otherwise they would keep getting emails.

- There was a bug that changed the blank name fields to '47' or 'email opened' and then people received emails with 'Hi 47'. I had to clear all data and start again because it was too messy to clean up.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest help was the fact that it brought both the marketing and sales on a single platform so we weren't working in silos. The teams had clarity on how many points of contacts were present for each lead and when to approach it best.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
review_question_answers.answer:
- The automation controls gives a richer data and analytics for the emails sent.

- Data management is smoother with dynamic and static lists.

- Custom field addition and lead scoring made it helpful to maintain a large set of data and run targeted campaigns.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
review_question_answers.answer:
- The marketing funnel/automation made it possible to do A/B tests, however there should be a simpler method of running A/B tests similar to Mailchimp since A/B testing is quite a fundamental part of Marketing.

- The fact that I can't manually remove a participant from automation, for example, somebody replied that they want to unsubscribe instead of unsubscribing using the footer link. I would have to blacklist that contact altogether otherwise they would keep getting emails.

- There was a bug that changed the blank name fields to '47' or 'email opened' and then people received emails with 'Hi 47'. I had to clear all data and start again because it was too messy to clean up.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: The biggest help was the fact that it brought both the marketing and sales on a single platform so we weren't working in silos. The teams had clarity on how many points of contacts were present for each lead and when to approach it best.

initial_reviews.review_title: A very handy MarTech Tool specially if you are starting out your marketing jounery
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
LeadSquared provides a lot of features in its product. The most obvious one is Lead Management. The best part is you get to choose what you do with Leads; either you put them in an Automation Journey or divert them into a Drip Campaign Journey. Additionally, LSQ has a lot of 3rd party connectors via APIs, which help you leverage your contracted 3rd party vendors, be it cloud telephony, email service provider or SMS service provider.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Honestly, there is nothing to dislike. The only actual room for improvement I see is in their reporting dashlets. They have a spectacular repository of automated reports, but most of them may not suit your business. So you will need to speak to their backend team to make custom reports for you. Ideally, like they have multiple lead filters to play around with, they should develop a reporting/visualization tool with various filters that helps you slice and dice the reports the way you want to see them. But I can tell you that with the kind of interactions, I have been having with their team; they will get this solution over time.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
When a lead is created and pushed into an automation funnel, I do not have to worry about creating cohorts of such customers as a marketer. The trigger, which creates a lead and pushes it into an automation funnel, if designed with rigorous thought and intent of conversion, will ensure the execution happens exactly the way you envisaged it. Also, every user action can be bucketed into a lead stage, and relevant communication about the next step can be sent to customers seamlessly without manual intervention. The benefit is that I get to see the effectiveness of the triggers set, the efficacy of the communication and the productivity or lack thereof when the customers receive multiple messages if stuck in the same cohort.

initial_reviews.review_title: Streamline Your Marketing Efforts with LeadSquared Marketing Automation: A Comprehensive Review
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
It offers a range of features that enable businesses to automate their marketing processes, manage leads and contacts, and measure marketing performance. Some of the key features of LeadSquared Marketing Automation include lead capture and nurturing, email marketing, landing page creation, CRM integration, and analytics and reporting. In terms of integrations, LeadSquared Marketing Automation offers seamless integration with popular CRM platforms, making it easy for businesses to manage leads and contacts across multiple platforms.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Limited customization options for email templates and the lack of some advanced features that are available in other marketing automation solutions.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
1.  Improved lead management
2. Streamlined marketing processes
3. Better insights and analytics

By addressing these common pain points in marketing and lead management, LeadSquared Marketing Automation can help businesses improve their marketing performance and drive revenue growth.

initial_reviews.review_title: Streamlined Leadsquared Marketing Automation!
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
This cloud-based solution effectively resolves your marketing needs by offering pre-programmed workflows and ready-to-use email templates. Regardless of the size or industry of the business, Leadsquared's robust features and capabilities help you optimize and refine your marketing campaigns like a breeze! From managing customer data to enabling effective collaboration, this CRM tool has proved to be very helpful for our business.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
I have used other CRMs as well and Leadsquared is not as consistent and suffers frequent integration fails as well. The software can definitely go with some improvement in some areas including - portal stability, customer support response time, and integration. Some times, fixing the block size also becomes an issue!

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have used Leadsquared as a marketing tool for our business. The platform supports emailing to a large group of customers in a single go with fixed templates that can either be chosen from the given list or modified as required. The tool supports quick uploading of images, various fonts for the text, and several other impressive features that make the email look quite good.

all_reviews.review_title: Good CSM support but way too many bugs for a more complex sales and marketing company structure
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
- The automation controls gives a richer data and analytics for the emails sent.

- Data management is smoother with dynamic and static lists.

- Custom field addition and lead scoring made it helpful to maintain a large set of data and run targeted campaigns.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
- The marketing funnel/automation made it possible to do A/B tests, however there should be a simpler method of running A/B tests similar to Mailchimp since A/B testing is quite a fundamental part of Marketing.

- The fact that I can't manually remove a participant from automation, for example, somebody replied that they want to unsubscribe instead of unsubscribing using the footer link. I would have to blacklist that contact altogether otherwise they would keep getting emails.

- There was a bug that changed the blank name fields to '47' or 'email opened' and then people received emails with 'Hi 47'. I had to clear all data and start again because it was too messy to clean up.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
The biggest help was the fact that it brought both the marketing and sales on a single platform so we weren't working in silos. The teams had clarity on how many points of contacts were present for each lead and when to approach it best.

- Custom field addition and lead scoring made it helpful to maintain a large set of data and run targeted campaigns.

- The marketing funnel/automation made it possible to do A/B tests, however there should be a simpler method of running A/B tests similar to Mailchimp since A/B testing is quite a fundamental part of Marketing.

- The fact that I can't manually remove a participant from automation, for example, somebody replied that they want to unsubscribe instead of unsubscribing using the footer link. I would have to blacklist that contact altogether otherwise they would keep getting emails.

- There was a bug that changed the blank name fields to '47' or 'email opened' and then people received emails with 'Hi 47'. I had to clear all data and start again because it was too messy to clean up.

all_reviews.review_title: A very handy MarTech Tool specially if you are starting out your marketing jounery
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
LeadSquared provides a lot of features in its product. The most obvious one is Lead Management. The best part is you get to choose what you do with Leads; either you put them in an Automation Journey or divert them into a Drip Campaign Journey. Additionally, LSQ has a lot of 3rd party connectors via APIs, which help you leverage your contracted 3rd party vendors, be it cloud telephony, email service provider or SMS service provider.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Honestly, there is nothing to dislike. The only actual room for improvement I see is in their reporting dashlets. They have a spectacular repository of automated reports, but most of them may not suit your business. So you will need to speak to their backend team to make custom reports for you. Ideally, like they have multiple lead filters to play around with, they should develop a reporting/visualization tool with various filters that helps you slice and dice the reports the way you want to see them. But I can tell you that with the kind of interactions, I have been having with their team; they will get this solution over time.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
When a lead is created and pushed into an automation funnel, I do not have to worry about creating cohorts of such customers as a marketer. The trigger, which creates a lead and pushes it into an automation funnel, if designed with rigorous thought and intent of conversion, will ensure the execution happens exactly the way you envisaged it. Also, every user action can be bucketed into a lead stage, and relevant communication about the next step can be sent to customers seamlessly without manual intervention. The benefit is that I get to see the effectiveness of the triggers set, the efficacy of the communication and the productivity or lack thereof when the customers receive multiple messages if stuck in the same cohort.

3. Call/chat history is well organized and it's helpful when leads are assigned to a different executive.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
1. Integration with the 3rd party lags the entire dashboard and the work gets halted for long hours.
2. Poor technical support as it takes a long time to resolve the single ticket.
3. Funnel/filter view is not clear and customized as some random data appears despite selecting the date range or appropriate filters.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
If you are company with heavy sales/operational data then LSQ is the best tool to manage all the tasks related to the users at one place.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Since we are a operational heavy startup, our operations/sales team collates the users' data for call/chat support and resolves customer complaints by registering tickets on LSQ CRM.

all_reviews.review_title: Comprehensive Sales Enablement, Marketing Automation & reporting; recommended for EduTech companies
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
1) It offers all the features of a good CRM such as contact management, segmentation, 360 contact view, lead nurturing, lead tracking, distribution, lead qualification, source attribution, filters, reporting & more.
2) Important Marketing Automation features include bulk email/SMS campaigns, drip campaigns, landing pages, webhooks to push/fetch data & auto responders.
3) Other common Task handling options & third party integrations are provided. It offers Zapier integration too.
4) It's highly recommended CRM for EduTech companies as it has all the required features for such at once place.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
1) It's slightly pricey per contact handled when compared with other SMB CRMs.
2) It's missing on a drag-drop campaign builder for creating Marketing automation campaign workflows which is found in other SMB CRMs.
3) It's a B2C CRM, may not be well suited for B2B companies.
4) It needs to add more features under Web Engagement & Telephony.
5) Parent/dependent fields get updated with a lag upon updating the Child field & that delay affects Webrule triggered activities eg: it takes up/works on previous field value instead of new updated value.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
It's very highly recommended for EduTech companies & works well for other B2B companies too. Leads from all the sources can pour into the CRM with direct integrations or Zapier or API integrations. Marketing Automation plan is the most recommended plan. Just care to see/enquire if integrations with your third party apps for payment, accounting etc... are offered.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
It enables collection of leads from almost all the sources (mostly directly) incl. Sulekha, Justdial, UrbanPro, Exotel etc... apart from the common lead sources like Facebook, PPC (Adwords), Twitter, Website, landing pages etc... This helped dynamic aggregation of all leads at once place, measure the effective of campaigns from multiple sources across various mediums & in further engagement of these leads.
API integration with UrbanPro & our native app helped collect real-time leads & attend to them asap.

all_reviews.review_title: A Hubspot Beater
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Landing pages, email marketing, drip campaigns. This software is very easy to use. It has all the features you would need for a marketing automation system at a fraction of the cost. The customer service is very helpful and will go out their way to help you. The system comes with landing pages, workflows, and many more features.

Also worth noting is the free CRM system that comes with it. It is very nice and keeps up to date with all my leads. It even integrates with Gmail so all emails are synced into the CRM.

The landing pages come with some really nice templates so you can be up and running in no time. I would have liked it if they had the ability to send rss emails but I hear that feature is in the pipeline.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
the system could do with the look being updated and to look more modern. some usability issues make the system less easy to use than it could

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
try it, you will find it has most of what you need. If you are coming from Hubspot you won't find a system that as closely matches it. Great value for money.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
generating leads, marketing automation

all_reviews.review_title: Strong marketing tool for entrepreneurs
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
* All in one package for your marketing needs
* Flexibility in setting up stages and whole customer lifecycle
* Drip Campaigns, Rules & Notifications - it would be awesome if emails could be sent to customers via Rules & Notifications
* Landing Pages have been a great help and integration is straightforward
* API & Webhook Integration and Help pages are well explained
* Lists have been very useful. I like the advanced search feature.
* Support team is very active and found them very helpful

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
* Features like website widget needs to be improved
* Design/UX for Email editing needs to be improved
* It loads quite slow and hampers in the work sometimes.
* Reports could be improved and excel attachment instead of pdf for saved reports will help a lot.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
Explore all the features and check out help pages. They are beautifully written and test out the services on your own as most of the customization has to be done by Administrator so that they should know the product thoroughly. In case of query, shooting a mail or chat with support helps a lot. It's expensive where the number of leads are quite high, so you need to take the call based on your requirements.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing automation for all our seekers and controlling leakage for our leads. Our channels for acquiring customers are not just online and before we setup LeadSquared, there was a lot of leakage in fetching all the leads on one portal and engaging with the customers. We have drastically improved our leakage in 6 major channels with present leakage less than 1%. We were able to achieve it through API integration or Zapier integration for those channels.

Major benefit has been standardization of our communication to customers and minimal leakage of less than 1%.

all_reviews.review_title: Best automation platform around
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
The platform is really intuitive and easy to use. It provides detailed reporting and automatically measures individual contact engagement. It gives us the visibility and strategic insight to exceed our marketing and business development goals.

We wanted a solution that could be a CRM as well as an automation platform and LeadSquared does a fantastic job in both areas. Having used many of the leading automation systems LeadSquared is the best solution around. On top of that their support is superb. They even customised their wordpress plugin for us at no extra charge. They have a great team and are always there ready to help you. Their price point compared to some so called market leaders is also incredible.

If you are looking to try an automation platform for the first time or switch vendors you should definitely look seriously at LeadSquared.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
LinkedIn integration but this isn't LeadSquared's fault it is LinkedIn's who have locked down their API, unfortunately it is a problem with all the platforms.

Could add in a reverse IP lookup tool, better A/B split testing for email subject lines and landing pages would be good.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
List the top features you need and organise a demo and trial it. The experience and support from LeadSquared is first rate. You will appreciate their value-add if you are coming from another vendor.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Improved visibility of all our business development

all_reviews.review_title: Great Lead management with sensible pricing
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
On top of the fact that Leadsquared does what it is supposed to, it comes with a sensible price tag. The people are extremely nice and actually respond to any questions and request you have. I have received a lot of help in tracking different things from our website to leadsquared.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
The user interface could be a bit more modern. This is not a problem for me, but for our sales who is not used to using this kinds of software. As a technology orientated geeky guy, the interface works for me.

The email campaign creation is a bit too technical as it basically demands that you understand HTML so you can modify your something else than text and images from your emails.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
If your marketing team can handle HTML and are otherwise tech-savvy, you should not have problems using Leadsquared.

Landing page management is easy as you have set up your templates.

Lead tracking is good and the people at Leadsquared are really helpful and reply pretty quickly. Leadsquared is developing all the time and they take customer feedback seriously.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Originally were trying to get more tracking and personalization to our email marketing. We used Mailchimp before and it had its limits. I was blown away what Leadsquared could offer to us.

On top of personalizing email marketing with any criteria, I can manage my landing pages and get really good information to our sales about our leads.

Building automation workflows is also possible, although I haven't set those up quite yet.

all_reviews.review_title: Effective on the outside + great user experience on the inside
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
I like the following:
- Simplicity of the interface with 4 main functionalities: email automation + autoresponders + landing pages + website widgets. Powerful functionalities, yet simple interface.
- Possibility to use our own design for email and landing pages: all seamlessly integrated with the Leadsquared functionality in the background.
- Simplicity of lead list management + individual emailing. Effectively, the system works now as our CRM: we moved away from SalesForce and use this instead. If your usage of SalesForce functionality is "basic", you can consider the alternative of only having Leadsquared: you would have a CRM and marketing automation on one system. Way simpler + the sales team love it: saves time = more calls. (Disclaimer: we run a native website system that can do billing - so you would still need that functionality separately.)
- Once the prospect clicks on an email link, his browsing history on our website is links automatically to Leadsquared. This applies also retroactively - even for activities that happened before clicking the email links. So when our sales team start a conversation with a prospect, they know exactly the professional interests of the user. We sell professional content subscriptions for our website, so this functionality is really key.
- Above all - professional and flexible team at LeadSquared that really reacts to our needs!

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
What could be improved:
- Leadsquared is for individual leads, i.e. people. If you have company accounts (which we do) and want to use this for CRM functionality, then tracking accounts is a bit more difficult. Doable (we have done this), but more difficult.
- No API integration with SalesForce. When moving from SalesForce which we pretty much had to move our database manually. But that was a good exercise for cleaning up the database.
- Some graphic output, such as click/open pie charts misrepresent data. Easy fix, I guess, but needs to be done :)

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Marketing automation for a professional content website that sells subscription. We have implemented some functionalities and are still exploring other, but what we have done so far has proven effective. Using this for 6 months now - mainly email campaigns and landing pages. In addition to marketing automation, we've moved away from SalesForce completely + use this as main CRM in parallel to our native website system.

reviewer.reviewer_job_title: COO - Digital, Technology and People Strategy

all_reviews.review_title: Forget Hubspot, Salesloft, Toutapp and Marketo. Leadsquared is what you need.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
End to end integration of the entire marketing and sales process. All the way for acquiring the leads, tracking the activity in the email opens, clicks and their subsequent clicks on the website, leadsquared provides THE BEST solution. I have used (both paid versions as well as the trial versions) of the following:

-Tout App
-Salesforce
-Marketo
-HubSpot
-Salesloft Cadence

to name a few tools.

The challenge was to find a tool thats easy for my sales and marketing folks to use and provides me the visibility on the team activities. Our team instantly loved the tool, minimum learning curve. We are up and running in literally few hours. We had the email templates setup, landing pages ready and all done in hours.

The Ease of use and ability to track the emails across LSQ as well as our own servers is a great features.

The best part is that the support team is very responsive and when me made few requests they immediately enhanced the product to support our sales process.

This is the only tool you need. Ignore everything else.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Having used for 3 months, I can say that its difficult to find a flaw.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
Dont use 2 or 3 systems for marketing and sales. I understand you can be tempted by say outreach or salesloft or toutapp and above all the salesforce. But having all the features you need in one place, so that all your marketing and sales happens from one system - that wont break the bank - is invaluable.

Dont for get you get 5 users even for the base plan. More than enough to give access for your entire team.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Sales automation
Marketing automation

all_reviews.review_title: Fantastic Product that is an Exceptional Value for Money
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
The support team - they never disappoint. My experience with other LMS we trialed was that they were not able to support the product well. Here the support team is always very prompt in helping and solutions are arrived at pretty quickly and efficiently. Customisations requested, though nominally charged, have been executed promptly and efficiently. There is never an issue too small for them to have a look into. I also love the fact that I can use them as a sounding board for my online marketing ideas and they have always given me great advise - especially Nilesh.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
There is really not much to hate about the product. They keep evolving every month so if I ever have felt I needed something added to the software Ii am usually surprised to hear that it possibly is in the pipeline. So all in all I really don't have any major complaints.
If i am forced to nitpick a nagative i would say they possibly could improve the role assignment for different users - maybe allow the admin to customise the access rights per user rather than be forced to use one of the pre-configured profiles.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
I have personally been very happy with this product and would recommend it wholeheartedly

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Leadsquared has helped maximise my return from my online campaigns. As the campaigns grow and get complicated leadsquared scales up easily and efficiently.

all_reviews.review_title: Just what we had hoped for, and a little more for good measure
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
At my previous firm, we were looking for a good email marketing tool with some advanced functions like lead-scoring, without requiring too much html/tech know-how to operate on. The requirement was a learning from using another software that had a whole suite of marketing automation tools, but required constant tinkering to work with. This simply wasn't a sustainable option, because as a start-up we had to be nimble and that meant saving time wherever we could.

Leadsquared got suggested in our discussions, and we did a thorough 15 day evaluation and eventually decided that it was just what we needed.

What I like best about leadsquared - pre-built templates, a responsive LP editor that makes building LPs a breeze and a very helpful support team! The best part is, as a client I always felt I was working with people, who are there to solve my business problem and not just with a tool.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
As a relatively new kid on the block, there are some bugs that crop up. But I'd not hold it against them. It's an iterative process where the client and the vendor work together to make things better and arrive at a win-win.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
For us LeadSquared had to do three things - email send, email and LP creation and Lists organization. The tool does this pretty well, with an easy to use interface and dashboard for reporting. But apparently, the tool supports more functions like CRM, but we never used it, because we already had a dedicated CRM software for that purpose.

If you are looking for a budget, easy to use email marketing software you are good to go with LeadSquared. If you are looking for a perfect tool, LeadSquared probably isn't it. Not yet. But as a happy customer I have reason to believe they are on their way. Their support makes up for the imperfections.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Email send had to become faster, with good list organization functionality.
LPs had to be designed faster, with good aesthetics
Needed lightning quick support to iron out the inevitable little issues that crop up while executing campaigns.

all_reviews.review_title: Excellent marketing automation tool with outstanding support
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
- Simple to use it is easy to see new leads and track them through the sales process.

- The support is outstanding, any questions are answered in good time and any features we have requested to be incorporated into Leadsquared have either been actioned or are being considered. If they cannot do something we request they suggest alternative ways around the problem. This is a rapidly evolving product and I feel they are up there in terms of features with the market leaders.

- The ability to score leads and have an engagement score is a great feature, helping us to identify leads that will potentially convert faster.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
I don't feel there is anything I dislike, only a few features I would like to see added but I am confident leadsquared will work on this and we shall see them available in the future.

- It would be nice for the sales team to get an email alert or notification in leadsquared when a new lead is assigned to them

- I would prefer to create a tracking url for a specific landing page directly on the landing page (e.g. use the same form but a different link for twitter, facebook, LinkedIn etc.) rather than having to go through the settings.

- It would be useful to be able to create folders for landing pages and email campaigns so that they could be filed and you don't see so many on one page




Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
I highly recommend this product, after using other marketing automation software systems this one is much better and the price you pay is outstanding value for money in comparison.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Previous to using leadsquared we had no way of tracking leads and often they weren't followed up within a reasonable time, potentially losing us business. Now we are able to track leads, easily share the information between colleagues and follow them up in a timely manner. It has made our sales team more efficient allowing them to focus their time on the more promising leads as well.

all_reviews.review_title: Marketing Automation @best value for money
all_reviews.review_content:

Have been using LS for 2 years now. A very easy to use marketing platform, detailed reports, good feature set, the new website widgets feature just kills it. I have evaluated almost all the Marketing automation softwares in the market, and no one comes close to the pricing for the features offered. And with the up-coming features list, and roadmap, i bet Hubspot and other players are up for a challenge.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Currently LS meets all our requirements.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
We run a lot of outbound/inbound campaigns for our customers and for ourselves. Normally it would take the marketing team a weeks time to setup the forms , landing pages , code etc. But with LS the same can be done in few hours. Plus centralised lead management makes it easy for the sales team to manage and track the leads without any lead leakage.

all_reviews.review_title: Great Automation Software
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
As a digital marketing agency, we use countless software programs to not only analyze data, but present that data to our clients. We first tried Leadsquared six months ago, and had three criteria that the program needed to fulfill as we tested it; 1) the program needed be able to accurately record data across landing pages, email campaigns, phone calls, and instant chats; 2) it had be flexible enough so that as we added pieces to the marketing funnel, the software would also record those new data points; 3) the software needed to have a robust reporting feature, with which we could provide instant snapshots to our clients, of the leads in the marketing funnel.

After a extensive testing, Leadsquared fulfilled all those criteria, and we began migrating all existing clients from competing marketing programs to Leadsquared. If you are looking to improve your marketing and sales automation, I recommend giving Leadsquared a try.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Nothing really comes to mind. They provide excellent customer support when an issue does arise.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
Go for it!

all_reviews.review_title: Helps my digital agency produce better results
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Leadsquared has always gone the extra mile to provide great customer support.  As an agency we feel our feature requests have been understood and, mostly, delivered!

The product has been evolving continuously and adding new ways to capture leads, helping us expand our scope of measurable service offerings.

Lead Scoring is a great feature. It's helped us identify leads that convert faster, and that has really given confidence to our team and impressed our clients.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Given the number of features, there is a learning curve involved for one to really make full use of the product. It can be overwhelming for our new joinees.

We often use AB testing on our landing pages and we continue to use other software over leadsquared because this feature does not exist in the product.

Recommendations to others considering Leadsquared Marketing Automation:
If you are willing to put in serious effort to improve your marketing ROI, consider Leadsquared. It offers a tremendous mix of features, which replaces at least 3 different products we used before. The best feature if leadsquared is their outstanding customer support.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Measuring the sales effectivrness of different lead acquisition channels, and within channels, the effectivrness of different campaigns.

Providing a better (more personalised) customer experience to prospects throughout the pre-sales period.

Reactivating old leads with targeted campaigns.

Differentiating our agency as result oriented and 'serious' about analytics.

What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
It reduces a lot of painful manual work involved in the lead management process.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Their Responsive landing page editor which is still in beta doesn't have enough feature set for professional marketers.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Managing the lead flow, assigning to different team members through lead distribution app and helping the team identify the most important leads to follow up on a daily basis.

We have seen a lot of improvement in the operational efficiency and reduction in errors while handling thousands of leads.

The APIs are a little hard to get your head around initially.
The contracts can be made easier.

Its quite as well to send out marketing emails and finding out who opened the mails, clicked on the links. The fact that it is integrated with Lead Management, it makes things more better.

all_reviews.review_title: Prompt response time & thorough explanation
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
I appreciate the direct response time to questions and tips for better use.
i love the autoresponder functionality, saves me alot of time.
i also like that when the email address of the lead bounces, it doesn't continue to resend.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
1) I can't tag certain leads for reminders..for example, if i called a lead and i got their answering machine, i need to put a reminder somewhere that i need to try again ...
2) also the list of actions is limited and pre configured like : leave a message, i had a conversation, etc...
3) when i'm in 'manage leads', and i click on a lead to look in more detail, when i come back to the main list, i'm not where i was ...it takes me back to the top of the page and i have to scroll back to where i was. (assuming the lead i was looking at was 2 pages down)

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
thru lead management, i've been able to attract more people to our workshops and have a more open exchange of their needs.

all_reviews.review_title: Definitely improved our Lead capture and Lead management process!
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Leadsquared has an intuitive and easy - to - use interface. The integrations it provides are very useful. The lead intelligence it provides is amazing - right from location to activity tracking to engagement scores.
I also definitely like the approachable and helpful team at Leadsquared.
The fact that they are continuously evolving and improving is a huge positive.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
The reports could use some improvement.
More templates and easier customization are required for landing pages and newsletters.
The integration for social profiles of Leads also needs improvement.
Given that Leadsquared is constantly improving, I am sure all the above is in the pipeline.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
Tracking the results of our marketing activities is a lot easier.
Leadsquared has helped with lead capture from more sources, consolidated lead database and better tracking of lead activities.
We have also improved our lead management process and reduced our response time.

all_reviews.review_title: Found a perfect lead management tool after 10 years research and reviewing over a dozen software
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
Most sales force automation software treat a contact and sales opportunity as two different items. Which makes them ideal for B2B selling situations. Whereas, Leadsquared treats every contact as a sales lead making it a perfect tool for B2C selling. With its help, we have been able to bring tremendous efficiency and transparency in the student acquisition process at Institute of Banking and Finance.

What do you dislike about Leadsquared Marketing Automation?
The application, would become a lot better in our use-case if we could append the notes field from task / to-do / other  forms.

What problems is Leadsquared Marketing Automation solving and how is that benefiting you?
We have been able to reduce the instances of missed leads with the help of leadsquared. The list feature has helped our counselors in more focused follow up of specific leads.

Lead Management System helps revitalize our Lead Engagement Process as well.
